root.name: Golden Royal Blackjack
root.description: Hit, Stand, or even Double Down. Can you get closer to 21 than the dealer? Casino style Blackjack with a golden twist. Certain royal cards are golden, if you win a hand with one of these, you win a bonus! Up to four players can play online or offline. Earn Awards, progress through 100 Ranks and unlock more backgrounds and card decks. Version 1.3
